org.colomoto.mddlib.logicalfunction

Class AbstractOperand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.colomoto.mddlib.logicalfunction.AbstractOperand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FunctionNode

    public abstract class AbstractOperand
extends Object
implements FunctionNode
    An operand in a logical function.

    This object depends on the type of logical function and needs specialised implementations.

    Author:
    Fabrice Lopez: initial implementation, Aurelien Naldi: adaptation
